AMAZE.PRO: An AI professional sales and customer service team! Let the AI customer service team save your valuable resources and focus on improving the core business!
AMAZE.HOUR: Create your own AI sales service team now!
AMAZE.DEPLOY: Instant deployment of industry knowledge base(IKB)
AMAZE.DIALOG: AI dialogue module - supports various industry knowledge base(IKB)
AMAZE.MODULE: Through AI modules, create exclusive sales dialogues, build professional knowledge bases, understand customer needs, and strengthen your customer relationships!
AMAZE.PM: AI smart manager that can help you connect with customers
AMAZE.PMSKILL: AI Amaze customer service can assist you in successfully and quickly taking orders, while maintaining internal communication and external coordination! Reducing operating costs, and maximizing benefits.
AMAZE.SOCIAL: Social media integration, comprehensive control dashboard
AMAZE.INTERACTIVE: Social Media Management and Interaction Performance Tracking
AMAZE.ONE: One-stop social media management, quickly integrate AI Amaze customer service into multiple popular social media platforms, help you establish Q&As, collect customer information, and e-commerce sales page processes, and understand interaction data through the backend system to create optimized services for you!
AMAZE.CUSSUCCESS: Our customer success team provides 1-on-1 consulting
AMAZE.CONSULT: Our customer success team provides consulting services to help you launch services and implement corporate strategies. Together with our AI Amaze assistant, we provide 24-hour services to help your brand and service succeed!
AMAZE.REGISTER: Register now and experience the "knowledge support" and connects people.
AMAZE.TRAINING: Training AI with exclusive databases can be very beneficial for your business!
AMAZE.AR: Through years of development in AR/VR/AI technology and cross-industry cooperation, we assist in tourism, retail, industry, medical, legal, education, military, police force and other fields to create intelligent applications and professional knowledge bases, continuously train AI, and achieve digital transformation for enterprises.
AMAZE.TOGETHER: "We grow together with our clients, helping you achieve success!"
AMAZE.GPT: Supported by ChatGPT's generative conversation technology!
AMAZE.PLATFORM: Integrated cross-platform marketing to drive traffic and sales!
AMAZE.ECO: Creating a virtual economy, moving towards a digital ecosystem!
AMAZE.TEAM: "create AI Amaze professional team in a snap"
AMAZE.KNOW: Instantly reading and responding with professional knowledge.
